views.markdown:
Sinatra - A stunning Now-Playing page for iOS 10

Sinatra replaces your current tiny music page with a redesigned look heavily focused on staying true to the existing aesthetics of iOS 10 to provide a natural, fluid Control Center page you will soon forget isn't stock.

Compatible with a ton of popular tweaks such as Masq , Horseshoe, Noctis, Harp, and more, now you can instantly access a full sized, beautiful tool to put you in-charge of your music from anywhere.

If you cant stand Apple's barren, dreary mess of empty space (and hate the road they're taking in iOS 11) , this will quickly become your favourite change of tune!

No options to configure.

Sinatra - 1.0.1 

- Fixed a bug where the tweak would become confused if opened inside a Landscape-locked app

-Small optimisations & refactoring in preparation for a major update, look through my Twitter feed to sneak a peek


Fixed a display issue with RTL languages
